sections.title: What is Nebeus and how does the bonus work
content: Nebeus is an app with a virtual card to manage money and make purchases online or via wallets like Google Pay.
It does not offer a welcome bonus but allows you to earn ‚Ç¨20 for every friend who registers, verifies their identity, deposits at least ‚Ç¨10, and makes a minimum purchase of ‚Ç¨5.
The virtual card is mandatory to complete the requirements but can be closed after receiving the bonus.
The bonus is credited within a maximum of 15 days and can be withdrawn along with the initial deposit.

sections.title: Main requirements
content: Complete registration by entering your phone number, personal data, tax code, and address.
Verify your identity with a document (ID card or passport) and a selfie.
Proof of residence is also mandatory, valid only if recent (less than 3 months) and with an address matching the document.
You can provide a utility bill, bank statement (not BBVA), or a residence certificate from ANPR.
Make a deposit of at least ‚Ç¨10 via bank transfer (preferred) or card (with a 3.5% fee).
Transfer the funds to the virtual card from the app and make a purchase of at least ‚Ç¨5 within 30 days.
Maximum 5 rewarded invites. The bonus arrives in 24 hours or within 15 days and is immediately available.

sections.title: Step-by-step guide
content: 1. Use the promotional code (in the community Codes section at the top of the page).
2. Complete registration with all required data and verify your identity with a document and selfie.
3. Provide proof of residence: recent utility bill, bank statement, or certificate from ANPR.
üí° You can get the certificate from https://www.anagrafenazionale.interno.it by logging in with SPID and selecting 'Residence Certificate'.
4. Order only the virtual card (the physical one is not required).
5. Top up the account with at least ‚Ç¨10 via bank transfer, preferably from Revolut, N26, or similar.
‚ö†Ô∏è Do not use BBVA for the transfer and do not top up via Revolut/BBVA cards.
6. Move the funds to the card: click 'SEND' ‚Üí 'EURO' ‚Üí 'TO CRYPTO ACCOUNT'.
7. Make a purchase of at least ‚Ç¨5 with the virtual card, even via Google Pay or Apple Pay.
üí° Ideas: Amazon recharge, phone recharge, purchase on Google Store, TikTok, or cheap apps.
‚ö†Ô∏è On Amazon, set EUR as the default currency before paying.
8. The ‚Ç¨20 bonus will be credited within 15 days of the transaction, often within 24 hours.
9. After receiving the bonus and inviting friends, you can close the virtual card to avoid the ‚Ç¨4.95 monthly cost by going to the menu ‚Üí 'More' ‚Üí 'Terminate Card'.
